channel.description: Week 3 Announcements This Week 9/10: Lab 1 Due 7 PM 9/17: Module 2 Quizzes 9/24: Lab 2 TBA: Discussion 1 Discussion Sessions Tuesdays 2:30 - 3:30 Office Hours Speaker Invites Sent First Speaker TBA Lab 2 Redo Lab 1 using Puppet Reinstall OS, Install Puppet, Make Snapshot Write Puppet Manifest & Test Keep it Simple! Use puppet resource to query Solutions < 200 LOC Growth Mindset Labs are Challenging Read the Linked Documents Ask for Clarification Start Early, Work Methodically Make Snapshots Keep in Touch! Discussions on Ed Stem Office Hours
